last_episode_to_air.name: Reboot
last_episode_to_air.overview: The time for hiding is over. Utterly "naked" and vulnerable, Lukas faces his adversaries. Or is his capitulation just a trick? He manages to outwit all the systems and to achieve his greatest goal. But his adversaries have pressed the reset button as well. It's far from over yet.

name: You Are Wanted
overview: Lukas Franke finds himself a victim of a hacking attack, his online information altered to implicate him as having masterminded a cyber-attack on Berlin resulting in a city-wide blackout. Suspected as a terrorist, Lukas scrambles to find out why he's been targeted, as even his family and friends begin to doubt his innocence.

production_companies.name: Warner Bros. International Television Production Germany

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Having just been considering blowing the whistle on the world's most powerful cyber weapon, Lukas Franke wakes up in a nightmare. His memory has been erased and Burning Man has vanished. Lukas has to find the program to save his family. He gets caught in a merciless battle between the security services and criminals, until the line between good and evil becomes ever more blurred.

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.overview: Lukas Franke is the victim of a cyber-crime attack. All his personal data, web and social media profiles get hacked and he gets accused of being involved in eco-terrorism. Lukas struggles to prove that he is innocent.

episodes.name: X-Ray
episodes.overview: Lukas continues to try to find out who is targeting him, while mounting evidence causes doubt in the mind of his wife. Directed by the hacker Kaufmann, Lukas travels to Frankfurt to deliver a package, where he meets Lena Arandt. Officers Jansen and Siebert begin their investigation of Lukas.

episodes.name: Trust
episodes.overview: Lukas is questioned by the police, and learns that they believe he's planning further attacks, and is working with Lena. Hanna is devastated following revelations leaked by the hacker. Jansen begins to suspect a leak within her department. Lukas finds Kaufmann, and demands answers.

episodes.name: Noob
episodes.overview: Now suspected in the killing of Kaufmann, Lucas evades the police with Lena's help. Jansen suspects Siebert may be the leak. Hanna is questioned by the police, and is fearful for her safety, and that of their son Leon. Lukas establishes contact with Marc, who demands that he locate a code that was sent by Case before his death.

episodes.name: Rollo
episodes.overview: Lena reveals her connection to Lukas, and opens up about her past. Lukas finds a clue from a previous meeting with Case, involving Leon. Arrested by the police, Lukas manages to send a warning to Hanna, alerting her that Leon is in danger. Lucas is taken from the police by the BND, the Federal police.

episodes.name: Burning Man
episodes.overview: Jansen and Siebert begin to believe that Lucas is telling the truth, and widen their investigation. Marc frees Lukas so that he can continue his search for the code, and puts in motion a dangerous plan to buy more time and hide his tracks. Lukas races the clock to find answers and save his family.

episodes.name: File Not Found
episodes.overview: Not long after Lukas and Hanna managed to escape the terror of the security services and hackers. Their plan was to make a fresh start. The horror starts all over again. When Lukas regains consciousness in a hospital suffering memory loss, the Burning Man computer, which he and Hanna had hidden as an insurance policy, has vanished. If they're to survive, Lukas has to find the computer.

episodes.name: Crypto Angel
episodes.overview: In his search for the missing laptop, Lukas meets the mysterious "Angel". She knows more about him than he does himself. And she's always on hand to save him. Is she really a guardian angel? With her help, Lukas starts tracking down the computer. When he follows her, he meets an adversary who ought to be long since dead.

episodes.name: Virus
episodes.overview: Lukas isn't the only one who wants to get his hands on Burning Man. As he searches for the computer, he is caught up in a cycle of violence that there's no escaping from. And Hanna has to make a choice. If she and her family are to have a future, being at Lukas' side isn't enough. She has to act herself.

episodes.name: Shift Memory
episodes.overview: To discover the whereabouts of Burning Man, Lukas has to face his inner demons, and they are more powerful than any previous adversaries. Ultimately, though, they show him and Hanna the path to the light - where the shadows are much darker.

episodes.name: Shut Down
episodes.overview: The digital world seems unbeatable and Lukas has only one final option. He has to "pull the plug". The consequences will be irreversible, but he's willing to take them.

episodes.name: Reboot
episodes.overview: The time for hiding is over. Utterly "naked" and vulnerable, Lukas faces his adversaries. Or is his capitulation just a trick? He manages to outwit all the systems and to achieve his greatest goal. But his adversaries have pressed the reset button as well. It's far from over yet.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Having just been considering blowing the whistle on the world's most powerful cyber weapon, Lukas Franke wakes up in a nightmare. His memory has been erased and Burning Man has vanished. Lukas has to find the program to save his family. He gets caught in a merciless battle between the security services and criminals, until the line between good and evil becomes ever more blurred.
